intro: Relaxing bird adventure: Explore 11 fantasy worlds, collect Memory Shards, and uncover the story of a threatened kingdom.
description:
Aery – The King’s Messenger is a story-driven flight exploration game in which you play as a small, graceful bird soaring through a peaceful medieval fantasy world. As the king’s loyal messenger, it is your mission to scout the realm, uncover hidden knowledge, and help protect the humans from a looming threat posed by the evil neighboring kingdom.
Experience a relaxing, immersive adventure that focuses on atmosphere, freedom, and discovery. Glide effortlessly over colorful forests, through vast valleys, across ancient towns, and past mystical landmarks as you explore the world from the unique perspective of a bird. Each environment offers its own theme, mood, and artistic identity, symbolizing different stages of the bird’s journey.
Your main objective is to collect Memory Shards scattered throughout the world. These glowing fragments hold memories and vital information that gradually reveal the story of the kingdom and guide you toward your next destination. Once you gather enough shards, new areas open up and the narrative continues to unfold.
With 11 expansive levels—each filled with collectibles, secrets, and unique visual styles—Aery – The King’s Messenger offers a calm, straightforward, and enjoyable gameplay experience designed to help you unwind while exploring at your own pace.
Features:
•	A peaceful, relaxing flight experience without enemies or hazards
•	11 large levels with unique themes, moods, and color palettes
•	Smooth, continuous flight controls for a calming sense of freedom
•	Narrative moments at the start and end of each level, plus contextual story breaks
•	Numerous hidden Memory Shards to discover and collect
